launchpad Reference¶

class ossvt.launchpad.bug_titles[source]¶

Get titles for all bugs in the IUS Projects Launchpad

class ossvt.launchpad.compare_titles[source]¶

Using the tiles from bug_title() we can compare our software name and version with the Launchpad Bug titles, this way we can see if a Bug already exits

class ossvt.launchpad.create_bug[source]¶

Taking advantage of launchpadlib we can create a Launchpad Bug, it is assumed you first used compare_titles() to verify a bug does not already exits
